Banning social media for under-16s: Kiwi kids deserve no harm, not harm reduction – Dr Samantha Marsh https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/banning-social-media-for-under-16s-kiwi-kids-deserve-no-harm-not-harm-reduction-dr-samantha-marsh/UHUUNKY3SZFVXBC7FG6WKHDFME/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/banning-social-media-for-under-16s-kiwi-kids-deserve-no-harm-not-harm-reduction-dr-samantha-marsh/UHUUNKY3SZFVXBC7FG6WKHDFME/ Dr Samantha MarshOPINION: Our kids deserve more than harm reduction – they deserve no harm. Sun, 10 Nov 2024 02:00:00 +0000 "Within just a few hours on TikTok, your child can (and probably will) view aggressive and violent behaviour, sexually aggressive content, and self-harm videos."
